data.title: Something fun and different to do in Duluth!
data.text: Super fun and exciting! Kept you guessing and thinking while working together with friends. Can't wait to try the other rooms they offer!

data.title: Awesome!
data.text: This was a great experience and super fun! Well worth checking out prison break! Excited to return to try another.

data.title: Awesome
data.text: We took a group of young teens for a birthday party and they had a blast! The manager was great working with them and giving clues to help them through the escape!

data.title: Lots of fun.
data.text: I went with five friends. The staff was very professional, friendly, and helpful. We had a lot of fun.

data.title: One of the better escape rooms
data.text: This was in my top two favorite escape rooms I've taken part in (we did the Prison Escape). There were a few creative elements and twists I hadn't seen anywhere else. Challenging enough to keep things interesting but not stressful.

data.title: Hangover Room
data.text: Was a lot of fun. Highly recommend to anyone who likes a challenge.  If you get stumped,they provided clues to put you on the right path! Can't wait to try the other rooms.

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us at Zero Hour. Thank you for taking your time to review us on TripAdvisor. We look forward to your next grand escape, hope to see you soon.

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Way more fun than expected
data.text: I had expected this to be fun. I had no idea how much fun it would actually be. My friends and I had the absolute best time doing this. We are definitely going to be coming back and doing any other rooms that they have to offer.

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We are so glad we exceeded your expectations, and can't wait for you to come back for another game! We have another room opening up very soon!

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Friends gettin locked up
data.text: This was a lot of fun.  They did an awesome job of accommodating our larger group of 15 friends. The people working there were a lot of fun and did great when we needed hints. Really clever clues and things to figure out. Would definitely do it again, just have to try the other room.

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
It was so fun to have such a large group go through! We encourage our staff to get creative and have fun with the customers. Thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: great fun
data.text: When i first heard about these types of rooms i said i am soo going to do that. When i found one in Duluth i was so excited. Zero hour definitely delivered a fun time great theme with the prison break room .

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for coming in and giving us a try! We love to offer a unique experience filled with challenges and laughs! Hopefully we will see you soon when the Wheel House game opens!

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Prison break fun!
data.text: This was a great experience.  The puzzles were challenging, but with a mixture of teamwork, life skills, and luck, we were able to make it with time to spare.  I enjoyed the feedback from the game master after to let us know what we did well and where we could improve for our next escape room.  5 stars!

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for the great review!! It's awesome to hear the game was challenging and enjoyable! Not everyone gets out in time, so great work! We look forward to locking you up again...

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Lots of fun!
data.text: We did the Hangover. It was entertaining and fun. Something different to do than the usual. Planning on coming back for Prison Break

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We are so glad you enjoyed the Hangover game. You will definitely love Prison Break, and we will continue to change our themes up to keep it exciting. See you again soon!

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Experience
data.text: The whole experience was enjoyable and my whole group had so much fun. Before we even left the building we were talking about doing the other room. :)

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for giving us a chance. We are happy we could make your experience a good one. Can't wait to have you back again.

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great for Girls Night Out
data.text: We did the Prison Break Room. We had a great time figuring out how to get out of the cell, then there was the paraphernalia room which the cell is in. After that we had to use the cipher to figure out the computer password. We erased our records and made it into the wardens secret room with the knock knock tune. We made it out with 14 seconds to spare. This was such an awesome experience for all of us and we can't wait to do another escape!

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for including us in your ladies night out. Happy you escaped in the nick of time. Hope to see all again for the next girls night out.

Your team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A Great Experience!
data.text: We had a fabulous time navigating The Hangover room.  The staff was friendly and professional.  I would highly recommend the Zero Hour to anyone considering it!

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for that great feedback. We are always striving to create a fun and memorable time for our guests. Hope to see you back again soon.

Your team at Zero Hour.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Can't wait to try out the other rooms!!
data.text: My dad and two brothers were in town for the weekend, so the four of us were looking for something fun to do after lunch. None of us had ever tried an escape room before. We decided to try out the Prison Break room. We were impressed and had a lot of fun. The level of creativity and strategy put into designing these rooms is excellent. The staff is friendly and engaging too!

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for the great review! We work very hard to create the best experience for our customers. We will be launching our Wheelhouse room very soon, follow us on Facebook for more updates. 

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Zero Hour rules!
data.text: We did the prison break escape room and it was tons of fun, I highly suggest this escape room. Also a great team building exercise!

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for the 5 star review! We are happy to hear you had a great time playing our Prison Break game.. Follow us on Facebook for updates on our newest room that will be launching in a few weeks...

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The hangover
data.text: We had lots of fun. Lots of puzzles to solve. Well worth the money price you pay to get in. Would def recommend it to others.

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Love the review! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor. We can not wait to challenge you with one of our other two rooms. 
Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Unexpected
data.text: What an amazing experience this was. It was our first time and we had no idea what to expect. To be put in a setting with friends, family, and a couple of strangers was an experience unlike any other and very challenging.

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for the amazing review! We work very hard to make our customers experience unlike any other. We can not wait for your next grand escape.. 

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome
data.text: The suits and the handcuffs made it really interesting...was really fun with our group of friends!!!

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks for the great review Joey! We can not wait to challenge your team with our newest game the Wheelhouse... 

Your Team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Prison Break-Such a thrill
data.text: My family and I were in Duluth this fall and decided to try this out--so much fun! It was a great way to get all of our minds working...definitely a team effort! Many laughs shared by all. Would highly recommend!!

owner_response.author: DuluthZeroHour, Public Relations Manager at Zero Hour Escape Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for making us part of your family trip! We are so glad you enjoyed Prison Break, and look forward to challenging you again in the future.

Your team at Zero Hour
owner_response.title: Owner Response
